item.title: Maduro's capture is 'beginning of the end' for Cuba's regime, House Intelligence chair says
item.description: House Intelligence Committee Chairman Rick Crawford says Maduro's capture may destabilize Cuba and Nicaragua.

item.title: Fraud fallout forces Democratic Gov Tim Walz to abandon Minnesota re-election bid
item.description: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz drops re-election bid amid massive welfare fraud scandal that allegedly cost taxpayers over $1 billion in fraudulent payments.
